org.petuum.jbosen.row.float_

Class DenseFloatColumnMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.petuum.jbosen.row.float_.FloatColumnMap
      • org.petuum.jbosen.row.float_.DenseFloatColumnMap
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DenseFloatRow, DenseFloatRowUpdate

    public class DenseFloatColumnMap
extends FloatColumnMap
    This implementation of FloatColumnMap assumes that column IDs are dense, ie. they are contiguous values from 0 to capacity - 1. In general, this class is more CPU and memory efficient than SparseFloatColumnMap.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int columnId)
        Check if this map contains the specified column. This map will always contain column IDs that are from 0 to capacity - 1, and will always not contain any other column IDs.
        Specified by:
        contains in class FloatColumnMap
        Parameters:
        columnId - the column ID to check.
        Returns:
        whether the map contains the given column ID.

      • get

        public float get(int columnId)

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        columnId - the column ID.
        Returns:
